post.text: "It wasn't just what happened in the limelight that made me grow more and more to admire and respect Hillary. I saw how she treated everybody with respect." —President Obama

comment.author: Cheyenne
comment.text: I am with Hillary permanent supporter and want my Hillary president America 2016 november.

replies.author: David
replies.text: Are u so stupid that u don't think people are gonna look at ur facebook, and see u don't live in the US.

replies.author: Zachary
replies.text: How much she pay you for that comment?
